title: A Surge Is Coming | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: A Surge Is Coming | Joel Osteen
description:
When you’re in a difficult season, you have to remember that the trouble is only temporary. God is using that difficulty to position you for new levels of His favor. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
